name: Christopher W. Evans
description: I was born and raised in Portland Maine, and attended highschool at the Maine School of Science and Mathematics in Limestone. After graduating Highschool and attending a summer long intership at Tilson Tech,   I was offered a fulltime position. Two weeks before classes were scheduled to start, I made an abrupt change of plans and took a gap year. During my gap year, I dedicated my free time to fun and enjoyable pastimes:
